name: Cozy Night
description:
When I can't sleep at night, there's always something to think about. It's an imagination where a fairy lives, and they escort me for a comfortable night.
The background of this game is a cozy room. The ark owner is sleeping. There's a waking being, the night everyone sleeps. It's a house fairy who lives right in the clock. They only come out of the clock at night when their owners sleep, and they're safe inside the house.
Watch The Cozy Night is a game about protecting the ark's comfortable night from various disturbances that house fairies can wake up from.

How to play: Move the mouse cursor to catch the worm.

*Sound sources : She - The Soundtrack Kings
